00015 // Node:
00016 var Node = function( id, mass, x, y ) {
00017   this['id'] = id;
00018   this['mass'] = mass;
00019 
00020   this['neighbors']=0;
00021 
00022   this['position']=new Object();
00023   this['position']['x']=x;
00024   this['position']['y']=y;
00025 
00026   this['force']=new Object();
00027   this['force']['x']=0;
00028   this['force']['y']=0;
00029 };
00030 
00031 // Distance:
00032 var Distance = function(){};
00033 Distance.prototype = {
00034   calculate: function( pointA, pointB ) {
00035     // X Distance
00036     this['dx'] = pointA['x'] - pointB['x'];
00037     // Y Distance
00038     this['dy'] = pointA['y'] - pointB['y'];
00039     this['d2'] = (this['dx']*this['dx']+this['dy']*this['dy']);
00040     // Distance
00041     this['d'] = Math.sqrt(this['d2']);
00042   }
00043 };
00044 
00045 // Graph:
00046 var Graph = function(){};
00047 Graph.prototype = {
00048   initialize: function( frame_width, frame_height ) {
00049     this['frame_width']=frame_width;
00050     this['frame_height']=frame_height;
00051 
00052     // an attractive force is applied between each node and the origin
00053     this['origin'] = new Node( 'origin', 1, parseInt(this['frame_width']/2), parseInt(this['frame_height']/2));
00054     this['originWeight']=48;
00055 
00056     // a "speed" multiple applied to all of the forces in each iteration
00057     // (a higher number makes the graph move faster but also makes it more volatile)
00058     this['speed'] = 12;
00059 
00060     // actually an _inverse_ gravity constant, used in calculating repulsive force
00061     this['gravity']=96;
00062 
00063     // the maximum repulsive force that can be aqpplied in an iteration
00064     this['max_repulsive_force_distance']=512;
00065 
00066     // the UI that will listen to this graph
00067     this['ui'];
00068 
00069     // the current selected node (when a node is selected, no forces may be applied to it
00070     this['selectedNode']=-1;
00071 
00072     // parallel arrays
00073     this['nodes'] = new Array();
00074     this['edges'] = new Array();
00075     this['originEdges'] = new Array();
00076 
00077     this['nodesText'] = new Object();
00078   },
00079 
00080   // add observers to subscribers queue
00081   setUI: function( ui ) {
00082     this['ui']=ui;
00083     ui.drawFrame( this['frame_width'], this['frame_height'] );
00084     ui.drawOrigin( this['origin'] );
00085   },
00086 
00087   // Graph is a TimerControl Listener. This is the function the TimerControl event handler calls
00088   update: function() {
00089     this.applyForce();
00090   },
00091 
00092   //
00093   getOrigin: function() {
00094     return this['origin'];
00095   },
00096 
00097   // apply an attractive force between a node and the origin
00098   // F = (currentLength - desiredLength)
00099   originForce: function( nodeI, distance ) {
00100 
00101     if ( this['originEdges'][nodeI.id] ) {
00102       if ( nodeI.id != this['selectedNode'] ) {
00103         var weight = this.originEdges[nodeI.id];
00104         var attractive_force = (distance['d'] - weight)/weight;
00105         nodeI['force']['x'] += attractive_force * (distance['dx'] / distance['d']);
00106         nodeI['force']['y'] += attractive_force * (distance['dy'] / distance['d']);
00107       }
00108 
00109     } else if ( nodeI.id != this['selectedNode'] ) {
00110 
00111       var repulsive_force=this['gravity']*nodeI['mass']*this.origin['mass']/distance['d2'];
00112       var df = this['max_repulsive_force_distance']-distance['d'];
00113       if ( df > 0 ) {
00114         repulsive_force *= (Math.log(df));
00115       }
00116 
00117       if ( repulsive_force < 1024 ) {
00118         nodeI['force']['x'] -= repulsive_force * distance['dx'] / distance['d'];
00119         nodeI['force']['y'] -= repulsive_force * distance['dy'] / distance['d'];
00120       }
00121 
00122     }
00123   },
00124 
00125   // apply an attractive force between two nodes
00126   attractiveForce: function( nodeI, nodeJ, distance ) {
00127     //   F = (currentLength - desiredLength)
00128     var weight = this['edges'][nodeI.id][nodeJ.id];
00129     weight += (3 * (nodeI.neighbors+nodeJ.neighbors));
00130 
00131     if ( weight ) {
00132       var attractive_force = (distance['d'] - weight)/weight;
00133 
00134       if ( nodeI.id != this['selectedNode'] ) {
00135         nodeI['force']['x'] -= attractive_force * distance['dx'] / distance['d'];
00136         nodeI['force']['y'] -= attractive_force * distance['dy'] / distance['d'];
00137       }
00138 
00139       // since edges are one way in our data structure, we need to explicitly add
00140       // an equal attractive force to our neighbor
00141       if ( nodeJ.id != this['selectedNode'] ) {
00142         nodeJ['force']['x'] += attractive_force * distance['dx'] / distance['d'];
00143         nodeJ['force']['y'] += attractive_force * distance['dy'] / distance['d'];
00144       }
00145 
00146     }
00147   },
00148 
00149   // apply a repulsive force between two nodes
00150   repulsiveForce: function( nodeI, nodeJ, distance ) {
00151     //   force = gravity*(mass1*mass2)/distance^2.
00152     var repulsive_force=this['gravity']*nodeI['mass']*nodeJ['mass']/distance['d2'];
00153     var df = this['max_repulsive_force_distance']-distance['d'];
00154     if ( df > 0 ) {
00155       repulsive_force *= (Math.log(df));
00156     }
00157 
00158     if ( repulsive_force < 1024 ) {
00159       nodeI['force']['x'] += repulsive_force * distance['dx'] / distance['d'];
00160       nodeI['force']['y'] += repulsive_force * distance['dy'] / distance['d'];
00161     }
00162   },
00163 
00164   // iterate through all of the nodes, calculating applicable forces, then apply to the node's position
00165   applyForce: function() {
00166 
00167     // draw nodes
00168     try {
00169       this.ui.drawNodes();
00170     } catch( e ) {
00171       alert( "Error Drawing Nodes: " + e );
00172     }
00173 
00174     // draw edges
00175     try {
00176       this.ui.drawEdges();
00177     } catch( e ) {
00178       alert( "Error Drawing Edges: " + e );
00179     }
00180 
00181     // reposition nodes
00182     for( var i=0; i<this['nodes'].length; i++ ) {
00183       var nodeI = this['nodes'][i];
00184 
00185       for( var j=0; j<this['nodes'].length; j++ ) {
00186         if ( i != j ) {
00187 
00188           var nodeJ = this['nodes'][j];
00189 
00190           // get the distance between nodes
00191           var distance = new Distance();
00192           distance.calculate( nodeI.position, nodeJ.position );
00193 
00194           // attractive force applied across an edge
00195           if ( this['edges'][nodeI.id] && this['edges'][nodeI.id][nodeJ.id] ) {
00196             this.attractiveForce(nodeI, nodeJ, distance);
00197           }
00198           // repulsive force between any two nodes
00199           if ( i != this['selectedNode'] ) {
00200             this.repulsiveForce(nodeI, nodeJ, distance);
00201           }
00202         }
00203       }
00204 
00205       // attractive force to the origin
00206       // get the distance between node and origin
00207       var distance = new Distance();
00208       distance.calculate( this['origin'].position, nodeI.position );
00209       this.originForce(nodeI, distance);
00210 
00211       // speed multiple
00212       nodeI['force']['x']*=this['speed'];
00213       nodeI['force']['y']*=this['speed'];
00214 
00215       // add forces to node position
00216       nodeI['position']['x'] += nodeI['force']['x'];
00217       nodeI['position']['y'] += nodeI['force']['y'];
00218 
00219       // wipe forces for iteration
00220       nodeI['force']['x']=0;
00221       nodeI['force']['y']=0;
00222 
00223       // keep the node in our frame
00224       this.bounds(nodeI);
00225 
00226     } // for
00227   },
00228 
00229   // force a node to stay in bounds {
00230   bounds: function( node ) {
00231     var d = (this.ui.nodeRadius( node )*2) + 4;
00232 
00233     var cxl = node['position']['x'];
00234     var cxm = node['position']['x'] + d;
00235     var cyl = node['position']['y'];
00236     var cym = node['position']['y'] + d;
00237 
00238     if ( cxl < 0 ) { node['position']['x']  = 0; }
00239     if ( cyl < 0 ) { node['position']['y']  = 0; }
00240 
00241     if ( cxm > this['frame_width'] ) { node['position']['x']  = this['frame_width'] - d; }
00242     if ( cym > this['frame_height'] ) { node['position']['y']  = this['frame_height'] - d; }
00243   },
00244 
00245   // add an edge to the graph
00246   addEdge: function( node1, node2, weight ) {
00247 
00248     if ( !this['edges'][node1.id] ) {
00249       this['edges'][node1.id]=new Object();
00250     }
00251     this['edges'][node1.id][node2.id]=weight;
00252     try {
00253       this.ui.addEdge( node1, node2, weight );
00254       node1['neighbors']++;
00255       node2['neighbors']++;
00256     } catch( e ) {
00257       //TODO: handle
00258       alert( "Error Adding Edge: " + e );
00259     }
00260   },
00261 
00262   // add an edge to the graph
00263   addOriginEdge: function( node, weight ) {
00264     try {
00265       this['originEdges'][node.id]=weight;
00266     } catch( e ) {
00267       //TODO: handle
00268       alert( "Error Adding Origin Edge: " + e );
00269     }
00270   },
00271 
00272   // add a node to the graph
00273   addNode: function( mass, text ) {
00274     // initialize the new node at a random offset from the origin
00275     var offsetx = (Math.random()*100)-50;
00276     var offsety = (Math.random()*100)-50;
00277 
00278     // store floats that represent the 'real' position of a node
00279     var x =this['frame_width']/2 - offsetx;
00280     var y =this['frame_height']/2 - offsety;
00281 
00282     // create the Node and add it to the collection
00283     var i = this['nodes'].length;
00284     var node = new Node( i, mass, x, y );
00285     this['nodes'].push(node);
00286 
00287     this['nodesText'][text] = node;
00288 
00289     try {
00290       this.ui.addNode(node,text);
00291     } catch( e ) {
00292       alert( "Error Adding Node: " + e );
00293       //todo: handle
00294     }
00295     return node;
00296   },
00297 
00298   // support access to nodes by their text value
00299   getNodeByText: function( text ) {
00300     if (this['nodesText'][text]) {
00301       return this['nodesText'][text];
00302     } else {
00303       return null;
00304     }
00305   },
00306 
00307   // set the selected node (by id)
00308   setSelected: function( nodeId ) {
00309     this['selectedNode'] = nodeId;
00310   },
00311 
00312   // get the selected node (returns id)
00313   getSelected: function() {
00314     return this['selectedNode'];
00315   },
00316 
00317   // clear the selected node
00318   clearSelected: function() {
00319     this['selectedNode'] = -1;
00320   },
00321 
00322   // indicate wif we have a selected node
00323   hasSelected: function() {
00324     return (this['selectedNode'] != -1 );
00325   },
00326 
00327   // get a node by id
00328   getNode: function( nodeId ) {
00329     return this['nodes'][nodeId];
00330   }
00331 }
